article.title: Status and history for [022]
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: Language identified as Gelao via Omniglot, assigned ISO 639-3 code 'giw' for White Gelao. Thanks to Adam Twardoch
stage 4: XML contributed by Eric Muller.
stage 2: entered in the index, OHCHR identified as the source.
